title: Grave of the Fireflies
description: Japan Quarterly Oct-Dec, Vol.XXV No.4, 1978"Grave of the Fireflies (火垂るの墓 Hotaru no Haka) is a 1967 semi-autobiographical novel by Japanese novelist Akiyuki Nosaka. It is based on his experiences before, during, and after the firebombing of Kobe in 1945."
author: Akiyuki Nosaka
